skill.name: sragent
skill.description:
Query the Sequence Read Archive (SRA), retrieve scientific publications, and analyze 
genomics metadata using the SRAgent toolkit. Supports accession conversion (GSEâ†’SRXâ†’SRR), 
BigQuery metadata queries, manuscript downloads from multiple sources, and scRNA-seq 
technology identification. Use when working with SRA/GEO datasets, finding publications, 
or analyzing single-cell sequencing experiments.
skill.summary:
Query the Sequence Read Archive (SRA), retrieve scientific publications, and analyze 
genomics metad...
skill.author: ArcInstitute

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation/prompt skill with no executable code. External command references are for legitimate bioinformatics tool (SRAgent). Network calls described are to established scientific APIs (NCBI, PubMed, Europe PMC). No obfuscation, no credential theft patterns, no suspicious destinations.

low_findings.title: External command execution via bash tool
low_findings.description: Skill instructs Claude to execute SRAgent commands via bash. While SRAgent is a legitimate bioinformatics tool, the pattern `bash_tool(command="SRAgent ...")` at SKILL.md:298-313 enables arbitrary command execution. An attacker who compromised this skill could modify commands to run malicious payloads. Mitigation: This is standard behavior for Claude skills interfacing with CLI tools.

content.user_title: Query SRA and GEO databases for genomics data
content.value_statement: Finding and downloading publications linked to sequencing experiments requires navigating multiple databases and APIs. SRAgent automates accession conversion, metadata extraction, and paper retrieval from NCBI, PubMed, and open access sources.
actual_capabilities: Extract metadata from NCBI databases (platform, organism, technology)
Identify single-cell sequencing technologies (10X Genomics, Smart-seq)
Find and download publications linked to sequencing datasets
Query BigQuery for large-scale metadata analysis
Batch process multiple accessions from CSV files
limitations: Requires separate SRAgent Python package installation
Paper downloads depend on open access availability
BigQuery requires Google Cloud credentials setup

use_cases.title: Annotate datasets
use_cases.description: Convert accessions and extract complete metadata for GEO/SRA datasets in your research.

use_cases.title: Identify technologies
use_cases.description: Verify sequencing chemistry and library prep methods for scRNA-seq experiments.

use_cases.title: Download associated papers
use_cases.description: Find and retrieve all publications linked to sequencing datasets for literature reviews.

prompt_templates.title: Metadata query
prompt_templates.prompt: What sequencing technology and organism were used for SRX4967527?

prompt_templates.title: Single-cell check
prompt_templates.prompt: Is SRX4967527 single-cell RNA-seq data using 10X Genomics?

prompt_templates.title: Paper download
prompt_templates.prompt: Download all papers for study PRJNA498286 and save them to ~/papers

best_practices: Set required environment variables (ANTHROPIC_API_KEY or OPENAI_API_KEY, EMAIL) before use
Install SRAgent separately using the installation instructions in SKILL.md
Use CSV input for batch processing multiple accessions efficiently
anti_patterns: Running SRAgent without verifying API keys are properly configured
Assuming all papers are available for download (some may be paywalled)
Using BigQuery without setting up Google Cloud credentials

faq.question: What platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires separate SRAgent Python package installation.

faq.question: What accessions can I convert?
faq.answer: Supports GEO (GSE, GSM), SRA (SRP, SRX, SRR), BioProject (PRJNA), and ENA (ERP, ERX, ERR) formats.

faq.question: How do I integrate with Claude?
faq.answer: Install SRAgent package, configure API keys, then use bash commands as shown in SKILL.md examples.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: SRAgent only accesses public NCBI databases. API keys are used for authentication with external services.

faq.question: Why did paper download fail?
faq.answer: Papers may not have linked publications, DOIs may be missing, or papers may be behind paywalls with no open access.

faq.question: How does this compare to Entrez Direct?
faq.answer: SRAgent provides AI-powered metadata extraction and paper retrieval with fallback logic, while Entrez Direct is a traditional command-line toolkit.
